section.name: Professional Consultancy
section.p: Some of the core DPML developers are available for consultancy engagements. The availability varies over time faster than it is possible to update this page, so please contact the developer for further information. The fees stated below are indicative only, and may be quoted differently for your project, depending on domain, complexity, time schedules, supporting documentation, and many other factors.
Please note that the engagement of these resources is a matter between you and the individual developer. DPML is not part of the transaction.
